name: Custom Data Processor
description: An integration that processes incoming data and modifies it based on user-defined rules.

settings.label: Source Type
settings.description: Select the source of the data to be modified.

settings.label: Enable Data Cleaning
settings.description: Enable automatic data formatting and cleaning.

settings.label: Transformation Rules
settings.description: Choose transformation rules to apply to the data.

settings.label: Output Format
settings.description: Choose the format for the processed output.

settings.label: Webhook URL
settings.description: Enter the URL where processed data should be sent.

settings.label: Processing Interval
settings.description: Set the interval at which data processing should run (Crontab format).
